character.name: Mario
character.description: The iconic plumber hero of the Mushroom Kingdom.
character.detail: Mario is the main character of the Super Mario series, known for rescuing Princess Peach.
character.skills: Brave, Incredible jumps, Rescue, Special powers

character.name: Luigi
character.description: Mario's younger brother and loyal companion.
character.detail: Luigi, although shyer than Mario, is a brave hero in his own right.

character.name: Princess Peach
character.description: The princess of the Mushroom Kingdom, frequently rescued by Mario.
character.detail: Peach is known for her kindness and bravery, playing a key role in many games.

character.name: Bowser
character.description: The main antagonist of the series, known as the King of the Koopas.
character.detail: Bowser constantly tries to capture Princess Peach to conquer the Mushroom Kingdom.
character.skills: Brute strength, Destructive flames, Domination, Evil

character.name: Yoshi
character.description: A friendly dinosaur and loyal ally of Mario.
character.detail: Yoshi can use his tongue to eat enemies and turn them into eggs to use as weapons.
character.skills: Long tongue, Egg shooter, High jump, Loyal

character.name: Toad
character.description: A Mushroom Kingdom inhabitant and Princess Peach's assistant.
character.detail: Toad is known for his bravery and loyalty to the princess.

character.name: Princess Daisy
character.description: The princess of Sarasaland and a close friend of Peach.
character.detail: Daisy is known for her energetic and competitive personality.

character.name: Donkey Kong
character.description: A strong gorilla who used to be Mario's enemy but is now an occasional ally.
character.detail: Donkey Kong is known for his strength and his starring role in his own game series.
character.skills: Immense strength, Powerful punches, Agility, Territorial

character.name: Wario
character.description: A rival of Mario, known for his greed and selfish attitude.
character.detail: Wario stars in his own game series, including WarioWare.

character.name: Waluigi
character.description: Wario's partner, known for his mischievous attitude.
character.detail: Although he doesn't have his own game, Waluigi is a popular character in the series.

character.name: Bowser Jr.
character.description: Bowser's son, following in his father's footsteps as an antagonist.
character.detail: Bowser Jr. is loyal to his father and often tries to defeat Mario.

character.name: Rosalina
character.description: The protector of the cosmos and mother of the Lumas.
character.detail: Rosalina debuted in Super Mario Galaxy and is known for her wisdom and power.
character.skills: Wisdom, Cosmic power, Calm, Protects Lumas
